title: Penguin Musume♥Heart
original_name: ペンギン娘 ♥ はぁと
opening_song: "Renai Jiyuu Shoujo♀ (恋愛自由少女 ♀)" by PNGN 6: Azusa Katoka, Mariya Ise, Yoshino Nanjou, Sakura Nogawa, Mai Kadowaki, Rina Hidaka
ending_song: #1: "Yurete Hajikete Afurechau☆Miwaku no Penguin Musume (揺れてはじけてあふれちゃう ☆ 魅惑のペンギン娘)" by PNGN 4: Azusa Katoka, Mariya Ise, Yoshino Nanjou, Rina Hidaka
sinopse:
Sakura Nankyoku is a total otaku. Due to a fluke, she gets elected as her class' Student Council President. Everything takes off from there into a series of crazy misadventures revolving around Sakura, her family, and her classmates.

(Source: ANN)
